Question: Which characters are associated with the Osaka Continental Hotel in *John Wick: Chapter 4*?
Options:
A. Shimazu Koji
B. Shimazu Akira
C. Wick and Caine
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the characters in 'John Wick Chapter 4'?
Options:
A. Chidi is the second-in-command of the Marquis de Gramont.
B. The Marquis Vincent Bisset de Gramont is a powerful member of the High Table.
C. Chidi is a member of the High Table.
D. The Marquis's position is challenged by John Wick.
Answer: a) Chidi is the second-in-command of the Marquis de Gramont. and b) The Marquis Vincent Bisset de Gramont is a powerful member of the High Table.
